information.warning: This product is a collector's item intended for ages 14+
information.quote: Now, hear the silence of annihilation.
descriptions: Once a mighty Shuriman champion remade as an Ascended, Aatrox helped halt the onslaught of the Void during the Icathian rebellion. However, in time, with no monarch or existential threat to defend against, Aatrox and the other Sunborn began to clash in a war for the ruins of the world.
Caged into his own sword for centuries by Targonian intervention, Aatrox was finally freed when a foolish mortal attempted to wield the blade.
Now set on destroying all of creation in an attempt to end his suffering, The Darkin Blade brings war and death wherever he goes.
features: LED sword, eyes, and wings lighting effect.
information.funFact: Made in partnership with our friends at Jimei Palace.

optional.title: Blood Moon Aatrox Merch Summoner Icon

descriptions: Blood Moon Aatrox approaches as the World Ender as he lands in the Series 4 line as Special Edition #05.
features: Aatrox in his Blood Moon skin
Exclusive League of Legends Blood Moon Aatrox In-Game Summoner Icon
information.series: Blood Moon Aatrox Figure is number #05 in Series 4

descriptions: Prepare for a Blood Moon rite with the Blood Moon Collectible Masks Set!
This trio of demonic masks comes with a display base as red as the Blood Moon itself, featuring Blood Moon iconography and a foldable backdrop showcasing the owners of the masks:
Blood Moon Talon - The indiscriminate demon assassin
Blood Moon Jhin - Blood Moon cult master of ceremonies
Blood Moon Yasuo - Blood Moon cult ceremonial executioner
Call forth the power of the Blood Moon Jhin, Yasuo, and Talon in the Blood Moon Masks Tee.
Fully certified for a wide range of activities from demonic possession rituals to work-from-home video calls, our Blood Moon Masks Tee is made of 100% cotton for cult-like comfort.

name: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story Collector's Edition

information.check: I understand the game code is non-refundable and non-exchangeable. The game region and platform I need are selected.
descriptions: We're excited to offer the Ruined King: A League of Legends Story Collector's Edition exclusively here at Riot Merch. Quantities are extremely limited. The Collector's Edition includes:
Digital Deluxe version of Ruined King: A League of Legends Story game*
Exclusive Art Book
Exclusive 12 inch Vinyl OST
Insulated Bilgewater Mug
Themed leather notebook and pencil
Exclusive Joe Mad sketch
Cloth map of Bilgewater
Golden Kraken Coin
*Voucher code for Digital Deluxe version of Ruined King: A League of Legends Story game emailed within an hour of purchase and is non-refundable

Developed by Airship Syndicate and featuring the art style of legendary comic book artist Joe Madureira, creators of Battle Chasers and Darksiders, Ruined King: A League of Legends Story is the first Riot Forge game that invites you to explore the League of Legends universe. In this immersive turn-based RPG, you will have the freedom to configure your party and control an unlikely group of League of Legends champions, explore the bustling city of Bilgewater and the mysterious Shadow Isles, and experience the Lane Initiative System.

information.warning: This item typically ships within 2 weeks from purchase.
descriptions: Feeling a little rough around the edges? Let Renektoy take a chomp at it!

Renektoy never backs down from a challenge - except for when their plush sword breaks... But fear not, with your help, you can patch it up and embark on endless adventures together, slicing through obstacles with joy and determination!
Don't keep Renektoy on the sidelines; bring this cuddly champion home and let the fun begin!

name: Song of Nunu: A League Of Legends Story Collector's Edition

information.check: I understand the game code is non-refundable and non-exchangeable. The game region and platform I need are selected.
descriptions: Friendship is a special kind of magic!

Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™ is a single-player story adventure developed by Tequila Works. Join best friends Nunu and Willump on a journey across the frozen wilds of the Freljord. United by their endless imagination and shared love of snowball fights, the two will have to work together to uncover the magic lying hidden beneath the ice.
Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™ Collector's Edition includes:
Digital game code for Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™*
Collector's Edition box
Exclusive Art Book
Exclusive Willump Plush
Exclusive Poro Plush
Pop-Up Diorama
5 Collectible Enamel Pins
1 B&W Collectible Print
4 Foil embossed Freljord Postcards

*Game code for Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™ will be emailed on launch day and is non-refundable with the exception of the PlayStation 4/5, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One editions. To complete your experience with either the PlayStation 4/5, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One editions, the game must be purchased separately.
Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™ Collector's Edition is available exclusively on the Riot Games Merch store. Quantities are extremely limited.
Collector's Edition orders will also receive a limited edition Nunu Plush Hat free of charge while supplies last!
Adventure awaits in Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story™.

Indulge your taste for both style and strength with our Akali's Kitchen tee! Adorned with a bold graphic of the Shadow Assassin savoring a bowl of delectable ramen on the front, this tee asserts that even in battle, there's always time for a satisfying slurp. Embrace the flavor of victory and let your fashion speak volumes about your passion for gaming and gastronomy!
THE GRIND THE GLORY
This is Worlds. Where everything you love about League of Legends reaches its peak. For 22 teams and 12 regions, these upcoming weeks in South Korea will put their mastery of the game to the test.
Get a taste of the glory that waits at the end of the grind with the Worlds 2023 Tibbers Plush.
Only available during Worlds, don't miss your chance to add this limited edition Tibbers to your collection!

A powerful channeler of magic, the acting head of Durandal Academy uses the academic registry book as a focus object to generate apocalyptic levels of energy... often while perched on a terrified student's head.
Durandal God-Weapon Academy is represented as a 6-piece keychain pack. Made from durable acrylic, bring the students, professor, and principal of Durandal anywhere you go.
Battle Academia Keychain Pack Features:
Battle Principal Yuumi
Battle Academia Katarina
Battle Professor Graves
Battle Academia Ezreal
Battle Academia Jayce
Battle Academia Lux

name: Battle Academia Durandal Class Zip-Up Hoodie (Unisex)

descriptions: Prepare for class with the Durandal Class Hoodie. The premium build of this hoodie will prep you for any lecture Professor Graves has to give.
Battle Academia Durandal Zip-Up Hoodie Features:
Embroidered Durandal God-Weapon Academy crest chest hit
Front zip-up
Battle Academia logo hemtag
